name: Shoot For The Top
description:
Official Music Video/Game for the song "Shoot For the Top."

Enjoy jogging around the neighborhood while listening to music.

Up/Down/Left/Right  or W/A/S/D to avoid obstacles and collect power-ups.

Collect the letters of the word "BONUS" to unlock the bonus round.

(Update: Added mouse/touch controls. They can be accessed by clicking the small D-pad in the lower left.)
